column4: hi how can I patch libv4l to fix my webcam? I have already this: http://launchpadlibrarian.net/36154071/add_USBID_064e_a136_for_Asus_UL30.diff
ubottu probably has a guide on applying patches
nope. I will look for a good guide
I can not find a very good guide out there. Pretty much you need to download the source it needs to be applied to and then use the patch command
